superherofacts: Aquaman is an alien because he comes from the water.

starwarsfacts: Darth Maul has two lightsabers that come out of his lightsaber hilt.

pokemonfacts: There's a Pokemon with guns on his back and he can shoot. He has guns on his hands as well. His eyes don't have lasers.
Pikachu is really good. He gets fire, meaning he can shoot fire out of his hands. He gets laser eyes. If someone touches him, they get electrocuted.
There's a Pokemon named 690. He's a robot. 690 is also a number and it's so big that if you try to count it, you die.
There's a snake Pokemon. He just is a snake. There's nothing else about him.
There's a Pokemon named Cutter Head. He can cut things on his head. He's a bad guy.

There's a Pokemon named Shark Head. He has a shark head and a cheetah body. He has spikes on his back. He has special swords, and he's actually a human who's really strong. The swords turn to fire and he can slice people.
Star Pikachu can shoot lasers out of his body, and he can shoot lasers all over his body.
ninjafacts: They have masks that cover their mouth.
They can do karate like Hai Ya! Ka Pow!
Ninjas are always black, and they can camoflage in the darkness because they are black.
